devdoc.details: This implements price feeds as our library

params.ethProvided: The initial amount provided in the call

fund().details: This implements price feed as our library

returns._0: uint256 The version of the price feed service in use

devdoc.title: A contract for crowd funding

FundMe__CallFailed().notice: Custom error for when a FundMe.withdraw call fails

FundMe__NotEnoughETH(uint256,uint256).notice: Custom error for when a call to the FundMe.fund() function is placed with insufficient funds.

FundMe__NotOwner().notice: Custom error for whenever anyone other than the contract owner tries to take ownership of the resource

getVersion().notice: This function returns the version of the price feed service.

withdraw().notice: This function withdraws all the funds set so far into the owner's account.

userdoc.notice: This contract is to demo a sample funding contract
